name: Snail Race (BreeInnit)
description:
this is my first game i made in godot so yeah

----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

how to play:

2 players spam a specific key, that key moves their snail first to the finish line
wins.

----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

controls: 

right arrow: move snail1

D:  move  snail2 

esc: exit game

-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

i'll also make snail race 2 where there will be more gamemodes, better graphics, multiplayer and more snails (probably will start making this when i have more experience with godot)
